cooking games : A Fast Food Restaurant
Girls games are best on mygames4girls.com! To have fun playing girls games, you need to install the Adobe Flash Player Download More Girls Games

Currently 4.09/5 1 2 3 4 5
4.1 /5 (384 votes) Loading... Make as many burgers for your customers as you can!
Just like in a real fast food restaurant, in this game for girls you will need to play at being the owner, and serving up all the food orders as they pile in!
Each time a customer comes and makes an order, you’ve got to try to get them that order. Drinks and melon are easy. For chips orders you’ll need to put them into a tub first. Burgers are the most complicated...click on a burger and a bun. Wait til the burger is cooked, and then put it into the bun. You can do up to three at a time (and it’s good to have three ready to go if you can!)
There are lots of other great games on www.mygames4girls.com . why not add it to your blog or email the address to your friends so that they can all come along and play too!
